bio:
So, my name is Rahul Sondhi. I'm currently a student at Stony Brook whose pursing an MBA and Bachelors in Computer Science.

I put the work in workaholic. It's not that I hate myself! I just don't see it as work as long as I do what I love. I love and have a knack for Business & Computer Science and explore roles that let me dabble in both.

I'm someone looking into Project Management roles to utilize my honed skills to bridge the worlds of Computer Science & Business. I'm an experienced software developer with leadership qualities ironed out through running and leading SBUHacks and Stony Brook Computing Society.

questions.questionText: Did you not spell hooligan right?
questions.questionAnswer:
My name is Rahul and Hul for short.
Substitute Hul for Hool.
BAM!
Huligan!
HTML, CSS, JS, Java, Python, PHP, SQL, Bash
I took a spirit animal test in high school and got a penguin. It stuck after that and also they are really cute!

No one ever made a difference by being like everyone else.
-P.T. Barnum
